name: Cute Fox Rescue Game
description:
----------------------------------------------------------

'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'

----------------------------------------------------------


Welcome to Cute Fox Rescue Game - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Cute Fox Rescue Game - a cool escape game?

Cute Fox Rescue Game is another point and click room escape game Developed by Bamvd.Com. Welcome back, escapers! Story of this game. Unfortunately, due to the huge storms lately, a lot of animals got into some sort of trouble. Most of them acted out of fear and ran into their doom. Only a few was lucky enough to survive until the help arrived. Like this little fox. It got trapped, but as far as I can see it's not hurt. At least nothing serious. However, I'm pretty sure he's hungry. He might be there for two days now. Therefore, you have to be careful when you free him. You know how a
hungry animal behaves.

Good luck and hurry!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
